## About me


My name is Varvara Rousseau and I a first year M.S. candidate studying Epidemiology planing to graduate in 2024. I am a child of Haitian immigrants and is originally from Queens Village but I now reside on Long Island.  I am interested in concentrating on infectious disease or chronic epidemiology with the hope of working for the CDC or at a biotechnology company like pfizer.
